message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm setting the initial price at $1,350,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but the value of this product to me is quite high. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. I'm confident this price reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I'm still a bit far apart from your new offer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,300,000. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
